content.text: is designed to provide a summarized account billing report for gas services associated with the National Grid West. It aggregates financial data such as paid adjustments, arrears, miscellaneous charges, and termination balances for a specific billing period. The view also counts the number of transactions that meet certain criteria. The data is sourced from three tables:
The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:
It involves multiple table joins and subqueries.
It includes a nested subquery to determine the current processing period.
